EmailTemplate.name: Detailed Store Visit Summary
EmailTemplate.subject: A store visit was completed on {!Store_Visit__c.Start_Date_Time__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: To whom it may concern, {!Store_Visit__c.Owner_Full_Name__c} just conducted a store visit for {!Store_Visit__c.Store_Name__c} located at {!Store_Visit__c.Store_Address__c} on {!Store_Visit__c.Start_Date_Time__c}. While visiting the store, {!Store_Visit__c.Owner_Full_Name__c} noticed the following things: <StoreActivities>
